content.text: It's going well. I'm about to go shopping. What are your plans for today?
I have to go to work but I'm excited because I'm going to be able to play racquetball after work with some friends
That sounds like fun! I've never played racquetball before. What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! It's a racquet sport that's similar to squash but it's played on a court that's smaller and the ball is a little bit bigger.
That sounds really interesting. I might have to try it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun and a good workout.
I'm sure I would enjoy it. I'm always looking for new ways to stay active.
I hear you. It can be tough to find time to work out, but it's definitely worth it.
It is! I'm glad to hear that you're a gym rat too. I'm always looking for workout buddies.
Me too! It's always more fun to work out with someone else.
Exactly! We should definitely work out together sometime.
I would love that! We can exchange numbers and figure out a time to meet up.
